VirtualSensor.title: phosphor-virtual-sensor configuration
VirtualSensor.description: The configuration used by the virtual-sensor daemon in the phosphor-virtual-sensor repository. Virtual sensors are xyz.openbmc_project.Sensor.Value D-Bus objects that have sensor values calculated from the D-Bus sensors listed here.

MaxValidInput.description: Maximum valid value of an input sensor

MinValidInput.description: Miniumum valid value of an input sensor

Sensors.description: Any DBus sensors whose values are used to determine the value of the virtual sensor.

Thresholds.description: Threshold values used to set and clear alarms

Type.description: The type of calculation this sensor uses.

Units.description: The sensor type, as it shows up in the D-Bus object name.
